body: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/SprmagaPmmkzwFPvvYNII2baCkEzRp3kYpdHF5IGr*1Gy3BFaazDWZoBAczv4xcWxq7MYZ*QxIBQSG-BFBOtvxAYDJ11sxuH/Adjacencieserror.JPG) hello everyone, If anyone can tell why am I am getting gaps in my floor and roof - would highly appreciate it. I have attached the definition, it's a little hectic but I am going with it one level and one piece at a time. Also checked: the missing floors are seen as ground floor and the missing roofs are seen as ceilings - so how do I properly change this?  Any suggestions are welcomed.
